headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: search_queries
parameters.description: A list of search queries. You can specify products, services, or brands as search queries. Max size: 5. Length limit for each query: 80 characters. Only English words are supported. Emojis and special symbols such as # are not supported.

parameters.name: regions
parameters.description: A list of country or region codes. Currently, the only supported value is US .

parameters.name: order_field
parameters.description: Sorting logic. Enum values: RELEVANCE : Sort the results by relevance. MONTHLY_SEARCHES : Sort the results by the response parameter monthly_searches . Default value: RELEVANCE .

parameters.name: order_type
parameters.description: Valid only when order_field is MONTHLY_SEARCHES . Sorting order. Enum values: ASC : ascending. DESC : descending. Default value: DESC .

parameters.name: total_size
parameters.description: The total number of recommended keywords to return. Value range: 1-1,000. Default value: 1,000.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Value range: â‰¥1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-1,000. Default value: 50.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: recommended_keywords
fields.description: A list of recommended search keywords.

fields.name: monthly_searches
fields.description: Predicted monthly searches. Prediction is based on historical data for your reference.
